products.name: Barnabas, Lord of Blood & Bone Shaker

characterabilities.name: Bone Pile [3 Tokens]
characterabilities.description: When a model in this unit destroys a living or undead enemy model with a melee attack, this model gains the destroyed model's corpse token and the destroyed model is removed from play. This model can have up to this model can carry up to 3 tokens at any time at any time.

characterabilities.name: Death-Powered
characterabilities.description: This model gains +1 STR and ARM for each corpse token currently on it.

characterabilities.name: Sacrificial Pawn [Bone Shaker]
characterabilities.description: When this model is directly hit by an enemy ranged attack, you can have one friendly, non-incorporeal Bone Shaker model within 3" of it directly hit instead. That model is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects. The Sacrificial Pawn special rule can only trigger once per attack roll.

characterabilities.name: Steady
characterabilities.description: This model cannot become knocked down.

characterabilities.name: Tide of Skulls
characterabilities.description: During your Control Phase, Barnabas can spend one or more corpse tokens to put a Bone Shaker model into play. For each corpse token spent, add one Bone Shaker model. You cannot have more than three bone Shaker models in play at any time. Place the Bone Shaker models completely within 3” of Barnabas. Bone Shaker models must forfeit their Combat Action the turn they are put in play. All three Bone Shaker models begin the game in play.

feat.name: Death Ritual
feat.description: Immediately remove from play one or more friendly living or undead models currently in Barnabas' Control range. For each model removed, Barnabas can gain one corpse token or one fury point or can remove D3 damage points from a model in his battlegroup. Barnabas cannot exceed his ARC in fury points as a result of Death Ritual.

execution.name: Sidestep
execution.description: When this model hits an enemy model with an initial melee attack or a melee special attack, it can advance up to 2" after the attack is resolved.

ability.name: Grievous Wounds
ability.description: A model hit by this weapon loses Tough and cannot have damage removed from it for one round.

ability.name: Blood Boon
ability.description: Once per activation, immediately after resolving an attack in which it destroyed an enemy model with this weapon, this model can cast a spell with COST 3 or less without spending focus.

spells.name: Blood Rain
spells.description: Blood Rain causes corrosion damage. Models hit suffer the Corrosion continuous effect.

spells.name: Execration of Blackest Night
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's command range, enemy models suffer -2 to their accuracy rolls. Execration of Blackest Night lasts for one round.

spells.name: Hunter's Mark
spells.description: Friendly models can charge or make a slam power attack against target enemy model hit by Hunter's Mark without being forced or spending focus. A friendly model charging an enemy model hit by Hunter's Mark gains +2" of movement. Hunter's Mark lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Onslaught
spells.description: The spellcaster and friendly Faction models beginning their activations in its Control Range gain Relentless Charge for one turn. (While advancing as part of a charge, a model with Relentless Charge gains Pathfinder.

spells.name: Rebuke
spells.description: Target model/unit cannot give orders, receive orders, or make power attacks or special attacks.

characterabilities.name: Companion [Barnabas, Lord of Blood]
characterabilities.description: This model is included in any army that includes Barnabas, Lord of Blood and is the same faction as Barnabas, Lord of Blood. If Barnabas, Lord of Blood is destroyed or removed from play, remove this model from play. This model is part of Barnabas, Lord of Blood's battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Dark Shroud
characterabilities.description: While in this model's melee range, enemy models suffer -2 ARM.

characterabilities.name: Steady
characterabilities.description: This model cannot become knocked down.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Unyielding]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Unyielding. (A model with Unyielding gains +2 ARM against melee damage rolls.)

characterabilities.name: Hyper-Aggressive
characterabilities.description: When this model suffers damage from an enemy attack at any time except while it is advancing, after the attack is resolved it can immediately make a full advance directly toward the attacking model.

characterabilities.name: Unyielding
characterabilities.description: This model gains +2 ARM against melee damage rolls.

feat.name: Black Tide
feat.description: Enemy models currently within shallow water lose and cannot gain Steady for one turn. Enemy models without Amphibious currently in Bloody Barnabas' Control range become knocked down.

execution.name: Hyper-Regeneration
execution.description: Remove d3 damage points from this model at the start of each of it's activations.

ability.name: Critical Consume
ability.description: On a critical hit, if the attack hits a small-based non-Leader model the model hit is removed from play.

ability.name: Blood Boon
ability.description: Once per activation, immediately after resolving an attack in which it destroyed an enemy model with this weapon, this model can cast a spell with COST 3 or less without spending focus.

spells.name: Death March
spells.description: Target friendly Faction unit gains +2 MAT and Vengeance. (During your Maintenance Phase, if one or more models in a unit with Vengeance were damaged by enemy attacks during the last round, each model in the unit can advance 3" and make one basic melee attack.).

spells.name: Flesh Eater
spells.description: When a living enemy model is damaged by Flesh Eater, the spellcaster or a living warbeast in its battlegroup in its Control range can remove d3 damage points.

spells.name: Swamp Pit
spells.description: Place a 5” AOE anywhere completely within the spellcaster's Control range where it does not touch a model's base. The AOE is shallow water. While completely within a Swamp Pit AOE, models with Amphibious cannot be targeted by ranged attacks.

spells.name: Warpath
spells.description: When a friendly Faction model in the spellcaster's Control Range destroys one or more enemy models with a melee or ranged attack during its activation, immediately after the attack is resolved one warbeast in the spellcaster's battlegroup that is in its Control Range can advance up to 3". A warbeast can advance as a result of Warpath only once per turn.

characterabilities.name: Dark Power
characterabilities.description: This model gains an additional die on arcane attack accuracy and damage rolls. Discard the lowest die in each roll.

characterabilities.name: Synergistic Magic
characterabilities.description: This model can gain power tokens. When this model destroys an enemy model with an attack, this model gains a power token. This model can spend power tokens to upkeep and cast upkeep spells as if they were fury.

feat.name: Death Harvest
feat.description: Each time a friendly Faction model destroys an enemy model while in Calaban's Control range, Calaban gains 1 fury point. Immediately after resolving an attack in which a friendly Faction model in Calaban's Control range destroyed one or more enemy models, Calaban can cast one spell. Calaban can spend fury points to boost accuracy and damage rolls on spells cast as a result of Death Harvest. Death Harvest lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Apparition
execution.description: During your Control Phase, warp this model anywhere completely within 2" of its current location.

ability.name: Grave Door
ability.description: A model disabled by this weapon cannot make a Tough roll. When a living or undead enemy model is boxed by this attack, you can choose to take Control of it. If you do, remove 1 damage point from it, causing it to no longer be boxed. You can then immediately change it's facing. For the rest of the turn, this model can channel spells through the affected model while it is in this model's Control Range. This model can channel spells even while engaged. The affected model cannot activate. At the end of the turn, the affected model is destroyed.

ability.name: Critical Consume
ability.description: On a critical hit, if the attack hits a small-based non-Leader model the model hit is removed from play.

ability.name: Life Trader
ability.description: When an attack with this weapon hits, this model can suffer 1 damage point to gain an additional die on the damage roll against the model hit. Life Trader can be used only once per attack.

spells.name: Bone Shaker
spells.description: When Bone Shaker boxes a living or undead non-Leader enemy warrior model, you can immediately take Control of the model and make a full advance with the enemy model followed by a basic melee attack, then the boxed model is removed from play. The boxed model cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.

spells.name: Carnivore
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +2 to melee attack rolls against living models. When an affected model destroys a living model with a melee attack, the destroyed model is removed from play and the spellcaster can remove d3 damage points.

spells.name: Hex Blast
spells.description: Enemy upkeep spells and animi on the model/unit directly hit by Hex Blast immediately expire.

spells.name: Occultation
spells.description: Target friendly Faction Model/Unit gains Stealth. Models are not affected while out of formation.

spells.name: Parasite
spells.description: Target model/unit suffers -3 ARM and the spellcaster gains +1 ARM.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Death Rage]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Death Rage. (When a model with Death Rage is disabled by an enemy attack at any time except while it is advancing, it can immediately advance up to 3” and can make one basic melee attack, then the model is removed from play. When making this attack, ignore the effects of Crippled aspects on the affected warbeast. The model cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.)

feat.name: Vengeful Spirits
feat.description: Choose up to 8 enemy models currently in Jaga-Jaga's Control range. Remove from play one friendly Faction warrior model within 5” of each chosen enemy model. Each chosen enemy model suffers a arcane damage roll with POW equal to the base ARM of the corresponding removed model. Models destroyed by Vengeful Spirits are removed from play.

execution.name: Future Sight
execution.description: This model can boost attack accuracy and damage rolls after rolling.

ability.name: Poison
ability.description: Gain an additional die on this weapon's damage rolls against living models.

spells.name: Battle Host
spells.description: Warbeasts in the spellcaster's battlegroup beginning their activations in it's Control Range gain +2" movement when advancing as part of their Normal Movement. The spellcaster gains +2 ARM while one or more warbeasts in it's battlegroup are within 3" of it.

spells.name: Deadweight
spells.description: When Deadweight destroys an enemy living or undead model, choose an enemy model within 2" of it. The chose model must forfeit either its Normal Movement or its Combat Action during its next activation, as its controller chooses.

spells.name: Ghost Walk
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains Ghostly for one turn. (A model with Ghostly can advance through terrain and obstacles without penalty and can advance through obstructions if it has enough movement to move completely past them. It cannot be targeted by free strikes).

spells.name: Grave Wind
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model gains +2 DEF and Poltergeist. (When an enemy model misses a model with Poltergeist with an attack, immediately after the attack is resolved you can choose to push the enemy model d3" directly away from the model with Poltergeist.).

spells.name: Signs & Portents
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, friendly Faction models gain an additional die on accuracy and damage rolls. Discard the lowest die in each roll. Signs & Portents lasts for one round.

characterabilities.name: Cull Soul
characterabilities.description: This model gains soul tokens from living enemy models that are destroyed within 2" of this model. After this model replenishes focus during your next Control Phase, replace each soul token with 1 focus/fury/essence point.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Undead]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Undead. (This model is an undead model and not a living model.)

characterabilities.name: Soul Taker [Unlimited Tokens]
characterabilities.description: This model can gain soul tokens. There is no limit to how many soul tokens it can carry.

feat.name: Spirit World
feat.description: Friendly Faction models currently in Maelok's Control range gain Spectre this turn. While within Maelok's Control range, friendly Faction undead models gain +2 ARM. Spirit World lasts for one round.

execution.name: Ghost Shield
execution.description: This model gains +1 ARM for each soul token currently on it.

ability.name: Spirit Eater
ability.description: This model can reave fury from enemy warbeasts destroyed by this weapon. Other models cannot reave fury from enemy warbeasts destroyed by this weapon.

spells.name: Death Pact
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control range, friendly Faction warrior models gain +2 ARM and Undead. Models are not affected while out of formation. Death Pact lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Mortality
spells.description: Target model/unit suffers -2 DEF and ARM, loses Tough, and cannot have damage removed from it. Mortality lasts for one round.

spells.name: Revive
spells.description: Return one destroyed Grunt to a friendly Faction unit with one unmarked damage box. Place the returned Grunt in the spellcaster's Control Range, in formation, and completely within 3" of another model in its unit. The Grunt must forfeit its Combat Action the turn it is put into play.

spells.name: Soul Harvester
spells.description: When target friendly Faction model/unit destroys a living enemy model with a melee attack, the spellcaster gains the destroyed model's soul token regardless of the proximity of other models.

spells.name: Venom
spells.description: Venom causes corrosion damage. Models hit suffer the Continuous Corrosion effect.

characterabilities.name: Call to Sacrifice [Bog Trog]
characterabilities.description: If this model is disabled by an enemy attack, you can choose a non-disabled friendly Bog Trog model within 5" of this model to be destroyed. If another model is destroyed as a result of Call to Sacrifice, remove 1 damage point from this model.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [Circle Orboros, Legion of Everblight, Skorne, Trollbloods]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for Circle Orboros, Legion of Everblight, Skorne, Trollbloods.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Blindwater Congregation]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Blindwater Congregation armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Prowl
characterabilities.description: While this model has concealment, it gains Stealth.

characterabilities.name: Warlock Adept [Blindwater Congregation]
characterabilities.description: This model can include Blindwater Congregation non-character Warbeasts in its battlegroup regardless of any other army construction rules. If this model has a bonded Warbeast, they may add it to their battlegroup.

feat.name: Dark Waters
feat.description: While in Rask's Control range, friendly Faction models cannot be targeted by attacks, charges, or slam power attacks made by models more then 5” away from them. Dark Waters lasts for one round.

execution.name: Reload [1]
execution.description: This model can spend up to 1 focus, fury, or essence to make one additional ranged attack with this weapon during its Combat Action per focus, fury, or essence spent.

topability.name: Attack Type
topability.description: Each time this weapon is used to make an attack, choose one of the following special rules:

subabilities.name: Arcane Interference
subabilities.description: Arcane Interference - When this model hits an enemy model, upkeep spells and animi affected that model expire. Additionally the model hit loses all Focus points and cannot spend Fury points for one turn. When this model hits a warjack, that warjack sufferes Disruption.

subabilities.name: Energy Siphon
subabilities.description: When this attack hits an enemy model with 1 or more focus, fury, or essence points on it, that model loses 1 focus, fury or essence point and this model gains 1 focus or fury point.

subabilities.name: Paralysis
subabilities.description: A living model hit by this weapon has its base DEF reduced to 5 and cannot run, charge, or make slam or trample power attacks. Paralysis lasts for one round.

spells.name: Admonition
spells.description: When an enemy model advances and ends its movement or is warped within 6" of target model in this spellcaster's battlegroup, the affected model can immediately advance up to 3", then Admonition expires.

spells.name: Boundless Charge
spells.description: During it's activation, target friendly faction model can charge without spending focus or being forced and gains +2 SPD and Pathfinder when it charges. Boundless Charge lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Fury
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +3 to melee damage rolls but suffers -1 DEF.

spells.name: Veil of Mists
spells.description: Place a 4” AOE cloud effect anywhere completely within the spellcaster's Control range. This AOE does not block friendly Faction models' LOS while in the AOE friendly Faction models gain Pathfinder and can move through obstructions and other models if they have enough movement to move completely past them.

characterabilities.name: Attuned Spirit
characterabilities.description: Once per activation, this model can cast the animus of friendly faction warbeast in it's battlegroup without spending fury.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Fuel for the Flames [5"]]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Fuel for the Flames [5"]. (When a model without Resistance: Fire suffers a fire damage roll while within 5" of a model with Fuel for the Flames, add +2 to the roll.)

characterabilities.name: Fuel for the Flames [5”]
characterabilities.description: When a model without Resistance: Fire suffers a fire damage roll while within 5” of this model, add +2 to the roll.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Blindwater Congregation, Trollbloods]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Blindwater Congregation, Trollbloods armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Side Step
characterabilities.description: When this model hits an enemy model with an initial melee attack or a melee special attack, it can advance up to 2" after the attack is resolved.

characterabilities.name: Spell Rack [2]
characterabilities.description: During list construction this model may select a number of spells from its faction spell pool according to its designated spell rack number. This model gains these spells in addition to the spells that are already on its card. A model may not have two identical spells on its spell card. When making spell selections from the spell pool deduct the spells COST from this model's available Battlegroup Points unless the spell entry lists another cost.

characterabilities.name: Warlock Adept [Blindwater Congregation and Trollblood]
characterabilities.description: This model can include Blindwater Congregation and Trollblood non-character Warbeasts in its battlegroup regardless of any other army construction rules. If this model has a bonded Warbeast, they may add it to their battlegroup.

feat.name: Spirit Realm
feat.description: Friendly Bullcroak and Croak models currently in Bagadibawm's Control range gain Incorporeal for one round. Additionally, for one round when another model casts a spell while in Bagadibawm's Control range, Bagadibawm gains a fury point or can remove d3 damage from a model in his battlegroup.

execution.name: Blade Shield
execution.description: This model gains +2 DEF against ranged attack accuracy rolls.

ability.name: Critical Dispel
ability.description: On a critical hit, upkeep spells an animi on the model/unit hit immediately expire.

ability.name: Double Strike
ability.description: This model can spend focus/fury to make two additional attacks with this weapon for each focus/fury point spent.

spells.name: Brand of Fire
spells.description: Brand of FIre causes fire damage. On a hit, the target model and d3 nearest enemy models within 5" of it suffer the fire continuous effect.

spells.name: Fire Step
spells.description: Enemy models currently within 2" of the spellcaster suffer a POW 13 fire damage roll. After the damage is resolved, place the spellcaster completely within 2" of its current location. Fire Step can be cast only once per activation.

spells.name: Iron Flesh
spells.description: Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit gains +2 ARM and Blast Resistance. Models are not affected while out of formation. (A model with Blast Resistance suffers one fewer die from blast damage rolls.).

characterabilities.name: Chain Attack [Claws] [Smash & Grab]
characterabilities.description: If this model hits the same model with two Claws intial attacks, after resolving the attacks it can immediately Smash & Grab. (This model can make a headbutt or throw power attack against that model.)

characterabilities.name: Man-Eater
characterabilities.description: This model can charge living warrior models without being forced.

characterabilities.name: Rise
characterabilities.description: If this model is knocked down at the beginning of your Maintenance Phase, it stands up.

characterabilities.name: Snacking
characterabilities.description: When this model boxes a living model with a melee attack, it can choose to remove the boxed model from play. When it does, this model can remove d3 damage points.

characterabilities.name: Wrastler
characterabilities.description: While knocked down this model can make attacks, has a melee range, can engage and be engaged, does not suffer a DEF penalty from being knocked down, and can use it's animus.

ability.name: Death Roll (★Attack)
ability.description: On a hit, before rolling damage you may choose to knockdown both this model and the model hit. If both models are knocked down, the damage roll of this attack is boosted.

animi.name: Rage
animi.description: Target friendly Faction warbeast gains +2 to its damage rolls. Rage lasts for one turn.

characterabilities.name: Shield Guard
characterabilities.description: When a friendly model is directly hit by a non-spray ranged attack during your opponent's turn while within 3" of a model with Shield Guard, you can choose to have this model directly hit instead. It is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects. A model can use Shield Guard only once per round and cannot use Shield Guard if it is incorporeal, knocked down, or stationary. The Shield Guard special rule can only trigger once per attack roll.

characterabilities.name: Sturdy
characterabilities.description: This model cannot be pushed.

animi.name: Rites of Power
animi.description: This model's controller can channel spells through it. When a spell is channeled through it, this model immediately suffers d3 damage points. Rites of Power lasts for one turn.

characterabilities.name: Bone Picker [3]
characterabilities.description: When this model destroys a living or undead enemy model with a melee attack, this model gains the destroyed model's corpse token and the destroyed model is removed from play. This model can have up to 3 corpse tokens at any time.

characterabilities.name: Death Strike
characterabilities.description: If this attack destroys a living or undead model, after resolving the attack choose a model within 4" of this model. The chosen model suffers a damage roll with a POW equal to the STR of the model destroyed by the attack.

characterabilities.name: Death-Powered
characterabilities.description: This model gains +1 STR and ARM for each corpse token currently on it.

characterabilities.name: Steady
characterabilities.description: This model cannot become knocked down.

animi.name: Swarm
animi.description: The spellcaster gains concealment. Living enemy models suffer -2 to attack rolls while within 2” of the spellcaster. Swarm lasts for one round.

characterabilities.name: Bloodthirst
characterabilities.description: When it charges a living model, this model gains +2” movement.

characterabilities.name: Man-Eater
characterabilities.description: This model can charge living warrior models without being forced.

characterabilities.name: Torpid
characterabilities.description: If this model destroys a living enemy model with a basic melee attack, it can immediately end its activation after the attack is resolved. If this model's activation ends as a result of Torpid, you can remove 1 fury point from this model.

animi.name: Spiny Growth
animi.description: The spellcaster gains +2 ARM. If a non-warrior model hits the spellcaster with a melee attack, the attacking model suffers d3 damage points immediately after the attack is resolved unless the spellcaster was destroyed or removed from play by the attack. Spiny Growth lasts for one round.

characterabilities.name: Bulldoze
characterabilities.description: When this model is B2B with an enemy model during it's Normal Movement, it can push that model up to 2" directly away from it. A model can be pushed by Bulldoze only once per turn. Bulldoze has no effect when this model makes a trample power attack.

characterabilities.name: Snacking
characterabilities.description: When this model boxes a living model with a melee attack, it can choose to remove the boxed model from play. When it does, this model can remove d3 damage points.

characterabilities.name: Territorial
characterabilities.description: This model can charge large, extra large- or huge-based models without being forced.

ability.name: Blind
ability.description: When a model is hit by an attack with this weapon, it suffers Blind for one round. (A model suffering Blind cannot make range or magic attacks, suffers -4 MAT and DEF, and cannot run, charge, or make slam or trample power attacks. It must forfeit either its Normal Movement or Combat Action during its next activation. Blind can be shaken.)

ability.name: Critical Smite
ability.description: On a critical hit, the model hit can be slammed d6" directly away from this model. If the model hit has a larger base than the attacking model, it is moved only half the distance rolled. The POW of collateral damage is equal to the STR of this model.

animi.name: Floodwaters
animi.description: While within 5" of the spellcaster, models treat open terrain as shallow water.

characterabilities.name: Back Plates
characterabilities.description: When a model hits this model with a back strike or a free strike, immediately after the attack is resolved the attacking model suffers d6 damage points.This model gains +4 ARM against ranged attack damage rolls originating in its back arc.

characterabilities.name: Carapace
characterabilities.description: This model gains +4 ARM against ranged attack damage rolls.

characterabilities.name: Retaliatory Strike
characterabilities.description: If a model with Retaliatory Strike is hit by a melee attack made by an enemy model during your opponent's turn, after that attack is resolved the model with Retaliatory Strike can immediately make one basic melee attack against that model. The model with Retaliatory Strike can make only one Retaliatory Strike per turn.

characterabilities.name: Impervious Flesh
characterabilities.description: When this model suffers a damage roll, roll one fewer die.

characterabilities.name: Steady
characterabilities.description: This model cannot become knocked down.

ability.name: Critical Amputation
ability.description: On a critical hit on a warjack or warbeast, fill in the unmarked damage boxes or circles on the last column or branch damaged.

ability.name: Chain Strike
ability.description: This weapon becomes RNG 4 during this model's activation.

ability.name: Pull
ability.description: If this model hits an enemy model with an equal or smaller base with a basic attack with this weapon, after the attack is resolved the hit model can be pushed directly toward this model until it contacts a model, an obstacle, or an obstruction.

animi.name: Elasticity
animi.description: Target friendly Faction model's melee weapons gain +1 RNG. Elasticity lasts for one turn.

models.name: Swamp Troll
models.title: Blindwater Congregration Trollblood Vengeance of Dhunia Light Warbeast

characterabilities.name: Prowl
characterabilities.description: While this model has concealment, it gains Stealth.

characterabilities.description: This model can be forced to remove d3 damage points once per activation. This model cannot use Regeneration during an activation it runs.

After the enemy model is moved, this model can make one basic melee attack against the enemy model. After resolving this melee attack, this model can make additional melee attacks during it's Combat Action.

ability.name: Sticky
ability.description: Models of equal or smaller base size hit by this attack can not move except to change facing for one round, Sticky expires if this model is destroyed or removed from play.

animi.name: Swarm
animi.description: The spellcaster gains concealment. Living enemy models suffer -2 to attack rolls while within 2” of the spellcaster. Swarm lasts for one round.

characterabilities.name: Impervious Flesh
characterabilities.description: When this model suffers a damage roll, roll one fewer die.

characterabilities.name: Paralyzing Gaze
characterabilities.description: While in this model's command range, enemy models with LOS to this model suffer -2 DEF.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Blindwater Congregation,Talion Charter, Trollbloods]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Blindwater Congregation,Talion Charter, Trollbloods armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Vault
characterabilities.description: After it makes a full advance during its Normal Movement but before it performs its Combat Action, you can force this model and place it anywhere completely within 5" of its current location.

ability.name: Drag

After the enemy model is moved, this model can make one basic melee attack against the enemy model. After resolving this melee attack, this model can make additional melee attacks during it's Combat Action.

animi.name: Flaming Fist
animi.description: Target friendly Faction model gains +2 to melee damage rolls and Resistance: Fire, and its melee weapons gain Continuous Effect: Fire. Flaming Fists lasts for one round.

characterabilities.name: Blood-Quenched
characterabilities.description: This model gains a cumulative +1 ARM and +1 to its melee damage rolls for each enemy model it destroys with a melee attack during its activation. This bonus lasts for one round.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Blood-Quenched]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Blood-Quenched. (This model gains a cumulative +1 ARM and +1 to its melee damage rolls for each enemy model it destroys with a melee attack during its activation. This bonus lasts for one round.)

characterabilities.name: Henchmen [Gatorman Posse]
characterabilities.description: Choose one friendly Gatorman Posse unit at the beginning of the game to be Henchmen. The chosen unit gains +1 SPD and MAT and Relentless Charge.

characterabilities.name: Lesser Warlock

characterabilities.description: If this model is directly hit by an enemy ranged attack, choose a friendly non-incorporeal warrior model within 3" of it to be directly hit instead. That model is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects.

characterabilities.name: Attached
characterabilities.description: Before the start of the game, attach this model to a friendly Faction leader for the rest of the game. Each Leader can have only one model/unit attached to it. The attached model is part of its Leader's Battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Dodge
characterabilities.description: This model can advance up to 2" immediately after an enemy attack that missed it is resolved unless it was missed while advancing. It cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.

subabilities.name: Reloader (★Action)

subabilities.name: Spyglass (★Action)
subabilities.description: Target an enemy model in this model's LOS. That model loses stealth for one round.

characterabilities.name: Bottom Floor [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: The lower level of this structure is considered to be concealing terrain.

characterabilities.name: Catastrophic Collapse
characterabilities.description: When this model is destroyed or removed from play, all models inside of it immediately suffer 10 damage. This damage is simultaneous and not considered to have resulted from an attack. Replace this model with all surviving models that were inside of it when it was destroyed.

characterabilities.name: Forward Deployment
characterabilities.description: This model can be deployed up to 8” beyond your deployment zone.

characterabilities.name: Habitable [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: Small and medium-based units and solos can enter this structure through a door on the lower level. A model/unit ending its Normal Movement within 1” of the door can choose to enter this building. Models entering this building can be placed on either the lower or upper levels. Models in a unit occupying this structure can be placed on either floor or both. There can be up to six small-based models or three medium-based models on each floor. There must be room for a model's base for it to be placed on either floor.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [any army]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for any army.

characterabilities.name: Movement Inside [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: Models/units can use their Normal Movement to be placed on the top floor if they were previously on the lower floor or to be placed on the lower floor if they were on the top floor. Units using their Normal Movement to be placed are considered to have moved. Models cannot otherwise move, warp, or be placed while inside the building.

characterabilities.name: Top Floor [Bunker]
